name: Guardian's Deflector
flavorText: The enigmatic sorcerer known only as the Guardian was convinced the world would one day turn against magic users, and he prepared himself accordingly.
flavorTextHtml: The enigmatic sorcerer known only as the Guardian was convinced the world would one day turn against magic users, and he prepared himself accordingly.

secondary.textHtml: Reduces damage from ranged attacks by 4.0%.
secondary.text: Reduces damage from ranged attacks by 4.0%.

secondary.textHtml: [1.0 - 4.5]% Chance to Knockback on Hit

 Regenerates 130 Life per Second
